alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 1:48AM CDT until March 24 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 147 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Whitesboro, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Whitesboro, Denison, Pottsboro, Knollwood, Randell Lake, Eisenhower State Park, Lake Texoma, Preston, Southmayd, Sadler, Dixie, Carpenters Bluff, Ambrose, Locust, Gordonville, Sandusky and Sherwood Shores. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
